name: Sylvanium
description:
Turn-based tactics game. What if a game like "Fire Emblem" had been released on the Game Boy? 

Developed in 72 hours, this is a turn-based tactics game with up to 7 levels. 

Built to be playable as an actual Game Boy rom. Play in the browser using an embedded emulator, or use the link to download the rom file and play using a method of your choice.

Controls:

  • A, (a button)
  • Z, (b button)
  • D-pad, (arrow keys)
  • start (enter)
  • select (shift) 

Limitations

Music does not play in the rom version of the game (only online), and saving does not work online (only in rom).  This is largely due to limitations in emulators and hosting. To see more technical details, refer to the dev blog for this game.
